@graph.name: analyze_screen
@graph.description:
Analyse HeLa fluorescence siRNA screen

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [analyze_screen](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/imaging/tutorials/hela-screen-analysis/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
* Uses [subworkflows](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_subworkflows.html)
